channel.title: Shop help delta
channel.description:
ok so every time i try to right click and trade a shop keeper or the rune store i get disconnected for a few seconds and nothing happens. i believe i have everything set up the way it should be but i cant figure it out this is in my shops shop = 2 Aubury's_Rune_Store 2 2 554 5000 555 5000 556 5000 557 5000 558 5000 559 5000 562 500 560 200
and this is in my client.java } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
am i missing anything?
